instruction: Paste the given text into the correct format.
input: [Text about the benefits of online education]
output: Online education has become increasingly popular in recent years, and for good reason. It offers a range of benefits, such as increased flexibility, cost savings, and access to a wider variety of courses. For students who are juggling a job, family life, or other commitments, online courses can make furthering their education much easier. Additionally, online courses can have significantly lower overhead costs than traditional in-person classes, providing cost savings to students. Finally, online education provides access to a wider variety of courses, catering to the needs of many different types of students and allowing for greater customization of learning experiences.
